== Name

comprehensive-test - exercise all manpage converter features

== Synopsis

*comprehensive-test* [*-v*|*--verbose*] [*-o* _FILE_] _INPUT_...

== Description

This is the main description paragraph.

=== Basic Formatting

This tests *bold*, _italic_, `monospace`, #highlight#, ^superscript^, ~subscript~,
and [.underline]#underlined# text. Also curved ``double quotes'' and `single apostrophe's` text.

=== Links and Cross References

Visit https://example.com for more info.
Email user@example.com for support.
See link:https://example.com[Example Site] for details.
Also see mailto:admin@example.com[the admin].
Cross-reference to <<other-section>>.
Man page style reference: git(1).

=== Footnotes

This has a footnote.footnote:[First footnote content with *bold*.]
And another footnote here.footnote:named[Named footnote content.]
And a reference back.footnote:named[]

== Options

*-v*, *--verbose*::
  Increase verbosity level.

*-o* _FILE_::
  Write output to _FILE_ instead of stdout.
+
If _FILE_ exists, it will be overwritten.

*-q*::
  Quiet mode.

[source,bash]
----
echo "hello" <1>
echo "world" <2>
----
<1> Prints hello to stdout
<2> Prints world to stdout
